titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that every Member establishes a written office policy regarding standards for the use of computer software, programs, and data bases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 9/24/1996--Introduced. Amends rule VIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require every Member to establish a written office policy setting forth standards for the use of computer software, programs, and data bases.
